Body: I am wondering if there is a smooth running android OS (5.0.2) for Moto G (1st Gen)?The new android system is just too cumbersome for me. I need something that works just fine, but it isnt full of things that slow the phone down.Here I have found a few: http://www.idroidspace.com/best-custom-roms-for-motorola-moto-g/I really like the 1st one but I was told there isnt a long-term, supported version. SO, I might take an awful lot of risk installing it. Right?
Title: Is there a low resource OS for Moto G (1st Gen)?
